item.title: SBST 2019

item.title: SBST 2019
item.description: Workshop Program 08:00. Registration. 09:00. Opening. 09:30. Keynote 1. Testing Cyber-Physical Systems via Evolutionary Algorithms and Machine Learning. Shiva Nejati SnT Center, University of Luxembourg 10:30. Coffee break. 11:00. One-Size-Fits-None? Improving Test Generation Using Context-Optimized Fitness Functions. Gregory Gay University of South Carolina 11:15. The Cloudification Perspectives of Search-based Software Testing. Diego Martin Borreguero, Sebastiano Panichella

item.title: SBST 2019
item.description: Tool Competition This year as well we are pleased to announce the seventh edition of the unit testing tool competition. We invite researchers to participate in the competition with their unit test generation tool for Java. Tools will be evaluated against a benchmark with respect to code coverage and mutation score. To participate: notify the organizers by sending an email to Fitsum Kifetew (kifetew@fbk.eu). check out the contest infrastructure and make sure your tool works well within the infrastructure.

item.title: SBST 2019
item.description: Venue SBST'19 will be co-located with ICSE'19 in Montréal, QC, Canada. For more information on the venue, please visit https://2019.icse-conferences.org/venue/icse-2019-venue.
